docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: # Tools
docs.text: Tool Notes Mod Organizer 2 Root Builder for MO2

docs.title: Dependencies
docs.text: Mod Notes Address Library for SKSE Plugins Base Object Swapper DynDOLOD - Resources SE DynDOLOD DLL NG SSE Engine Fixes (skse64 plugin) Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE64) powerofthree's Tweaks

docs.title: Base
docs.text: Mod Notes Folkvangr - Grass and Landscape Overhaul Skyrim Realistic Overhaul Merge all three parts and the update file. Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM FOMOD: Install the "Everything" preset.

docs.title: Misc
docs.text: Mod Notes Blended Roads FOMOD: Install Blended Roads (not "REALly" Blended) and the SMIM patch. Cathedral - 3D Rocky Shores Creation Club Open Helmets Enhanced Vanilla Trees Recommended: Enhanced Vanilla Trees SE-Basic Fluffworks (Fluffy Animals) Recommended: Fluffworks Quality HD Reworked Baskets HD Reworked Bears HD Reworked Cows HD Reworked Dogs HD Reworked Dragonplate Armor HD Reworked Dragons Collection HD Reworked Falmer Architecture HD Reworked Farmhouses HD Reworked Horses HD Reworked Mammoths HD Reworked Ores HD Reworked Pelts HD Reworked Shellbug HD Reworked Trolls HD Reworked Wolves High Poly Vanilla Hair Improved closefaced helmets Iron Armors and Weapons - Environment Mapped Merge the CC Open Helmet Patch file. Iron Armors and Weapons Retexture SE Majestic Mountains Recommended: Lightside Simplicity of Sea

docs.title: Shaders
docs.text: Mod Notes Auto Parallax Edit AutoParallax.ini and set bAutoEnableParallax = true. Community Shaders Complex Parallax Materials Dynamic Cubemaps Grass Collision Grass Lighting Light Limit Fix Screen-Space Shadows Shaders of Solstheim - Ash and Moss Simplicity of Snow Subsurface Scattering Tree LOD Lighting Vanilla HDR Water Blending Water Caustics Water Parallax Wetness Effects
